GET:
WITH logged_user AS (
            SELECT
            user_id,
            user_isadmin,
            user_isinactive
            FROM users u
            JOIN session s ON u.user_id = s.session_userid
            WHERE (#string:session-token# IS NOT NULL) AND (s.session_token = #string:session-token#)
            LIMIT 1
        )

        SELECT 
            s.session_id AS id,
            s.session_userid AS user_id, 
            substring(s.session_token from 1 for 31)||'xxxxx' AS token, 
            s.session_createdtimestamp AS created
        FROM 
            logged_user lu,
            session s
        WHERE
            (lu.user_isinactive = false) AND
            (lu.user_isadmin = true)
        GROUP BY
            s.session_id
        ORDER BY
            s.session_id
